flexflux.interaction

Class Relation

  • java.lang.Object
    • flexflux.interaction.Relation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InversedRelation, RelationWithList, Unique

    public abstract class Relation
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for all relations. Relations can be composed of other relations (And, OR), or be the end of a branch (Unique).
    Author:
    lmarmiesse 7 mars 2013
